scripts.build: rtlcss dist/css/formsmd.css dist/css/formsmd.rtl.css && tsc && npm run lint && npm run format && csso dist/css/formsmd.css -o dist/css/formsmd.min.css -s file && csso dist/css/formsmd.rtl.css -o dist/css/formsmd.rtl.min.css -s file && webpack --config webpack.config.js && npx babel dist/js/formsmd.bundle.min.js -o dist/js/formsmd.bundle.min.js && terser dist/js/formsmd.bundle.min.js -o dist/js/formsmd.bundle.min.js && npx babel dist/js/composer.bundle.min.js -o dist/js/composer.bundle.min.js && terser dist/js/composer.bundle.min.js -o dist/js/composer.bundle.min.js
scripts.lint: eslint bin/ --fix && eslint google-apps-script/ --fix && eslint src/ --fix && eslint tests/ --fix
